name: Jungle Jive
overview:
The Jungle Jive pusher is the most popular, successful and highest earning pusher in the redemption industry. When you think of pushers, you have to think of Harry Levy Amusement Contractor Ltd., associated with the highest quality and highest earning pushers all over the world.


Jungle Jive is a coin or token operated skill redemption game. The player tries to force coins or tokens off the playfield by skillfully inserting his coin into a moveable coin entry chute and timing the movement of the ever moving "pusher" shelves. Tickets are then awarded for each coin that is pushed off the shelves.
The Jungle Jive game is available in 2, 3, 4 or 6 player configurations. Jungle Jive has been approved for amusement redemption operation in many states and jurisdictions that require game approvals.
